mapper.insert: insert into cart (product_code, user_id, order_de_amount) values(#{product_code}, #{user_id}, #{order_de_amount})
mapper.select: select c.cart_num, c.product_code, c.user_id, c.order_de_amount, ct.category_name, p.product_name, p.product_price, i.product_img_name from cart c, product p, category ct, product_img i where user_id = #{user_id} and c.product_code = p.product_code and p.category_code = ct.category_code and p.product_code = i.product_code and i.product_img_type = 1
